title: Sapphire Robe
summaries: The Sapphire Robe is an armor item that can be worn in the shirt slot. It is part of the Wizard set and is the third weakest type of gem robe.

Wearing the <linked>Wizard Hat</linked> alongside the Sapphire Robe provides a set bonus of +10% magic <linked>critical strike chance</linked>, whereas wearing a <linked>Magic Hat</linked> alongside it provides a set bonus of +60 <linked>mana</linked>. Any leg-slot equipment can be worn with these set bonuses remaining intact.
